description: Unfortunately, I was not able to access your previous revision. However, I obtained a different version of the document authored by Saúl K't. I made my own modifications to the document, including adding palm muting in measures such as measure 33, making adjustments to measures like measure 50, and correcting issues in measures 63, 68, and 72. Additionally, I relocated the solo to a more convenient position. After reviewing a live performance, I decided not to include the 1's in measure 17.
title: The Dying Song (Time to Sing)

description:
I changed guitar to have chords all of the time is mikes part, also fixed minor errors in measures 68 - 73 (interlude). This is my first ever revision, so I hope you enjoy my time spent fixing my favorite band on my favorite tab site! 
(via editor)
title: The Dying Song (Time to Sing)

description: Names added to missing tracks & separated percussions tracks (Shawn and Tortilla).
title: The Dying Song (Time to Sing)

description: Complete version with bass, drums and rhythm guitar
title: The Dying Song (Time to Sing)
